basics.name: Harish Balasubramani
basics.label: Algorithmic Trader & Fintech Specialist
basics.summary: Experienced in digital assets and FX markets with hands-on involvement in trading operations, options, and OTC environments across the EMEA region. Skilled in cryptocurrency trading and algorithm development using Rust, Python, and MQL5. Strong understanding of asset management, RWA, and SLA performance metrics. Focused on alpha generation through data-driven strategies, process optimisation, and innovation within digital trading ecosystems and accelerator programs.

work.name: Independent
work.summary: Designed and deployed automated trading systems for digital assets, FX, and options, integrating APIs, data feeds, and indicators. Conducted ETL, backtesting, and optimisation using MQL5 and Python to ensure reliability. Improved OTC workflows and algorithms, enhancing automation and alpha generation.

work.name: ZISHI
work.summary: Assisted in trading operations across digital assets, FX, and options, analysing data to support algorithmic strategy development. Monitored market performance, executed simulated trades, and ensured SLA adherence within client portfolios. Collaborated with senior traders to enhance algorithmic efficiency, risk control, and overall business performance.

projects.name: Optimising Forex Trading Strategies in MQL5: HFT, Trend & Mean-Reversion
projects.description: Developed and tested algorithmic trading strategies in MQL5 and MetaTrader 5, analysing performance across multiple market conditions. Applied data analysis, ETL, and performance metrics to enhance system efficiency, risk control, and algorithmic optimisation.

projects.name: MQL5 Trading Indicator
projects.description: Developed an algorithmic trading indicator with 12 configurable moving averages (SMA, EMA) for multi-timeframe data analysis in digital assets and FX markets. Designed intuitive interface with visual alerts and setup documentation for ease of use.
